channel.title: Ubuntu on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on Sam Adesoga's Personal Blog

item.title: Sorting out devices - Wireless, Inbuilt Microphone on Ubuntu Hardy Heron
item.description: >Faced with the reality of having to hand in my MAC to my former workplace, i decided to buy a Windows machine (HP 6735s Laptop, AMD Athlon TM X2 Dual Core QL-60 1.9Ghz, 4GB memory, 250GB HDD, DVD+-RW SMDL LightScribe writer, Webcam 15.4” WXGA (1280 x 800) WLAN Bluetooth Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium ) and being a MAC - convert, coupled with the numerous negative feedback about Vista. I have installed Ubuntu Hardy Heron on a seperate partition.
